name: Dhukk the Pierced

skills.name: Mad Chopper
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 40% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ACC] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: 40% chance per hit (booked), 50% Decrease ACC debuff

skills.book_value: Moderate - increases debuff chance from 30% to 40% per hit, adding +10% total debuff chance
skills.notes: 2-hit attack with Dec ACC on each hit. Useful for reducing enemy accuracy in content where ACC debuffs matter (e.g., Clan Boss, Doom Tower).

skills.name: Lunatic Outburst
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 100% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns. Also has a 75% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns on each critical hit.

effects.notes: 75% chance on critical hit (booked), 60% Decrease DEF debuff - requires 100% crit rate for consistency

skills.book_value: High - reduces cooldown from 4 to 3 turns, increases debuff chances from 75% to 100% (Dec ATK) and 75% (Dec DEF on crit). Critical for debuff uptime.
skills.notes: PRIMARY DEBUFFER SKILL. AoE Dec ATK (100% booked) + Dec DEF (75% on crit booked). Build 100% crit rate to guarantee Dec DEF on all targets. 3-turn cooldown when booked allows near-permanent debuff coverage in long fights.

skills.name: Shrieking Display
skills.description: Places a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn on the target enemy. Also has a 75% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn on 2 random enemies. Places a 30% [Reflect Damage] buff on this champion for 2 turns and a [Unkillable] buff on this champion for 1 turn.

effects.notes: 75% chance to Provoke 2 additional random enemies
Unkillable buff on self for 1 turn

skills.book_value: High - reduces cooldown from 6 to 4 turns, significantly improving Unkillable uptime and control frequency
skills.notes: CONTROL + SURVIVABILITY SKILL. Provoke on 1-3 enemies (1 guaranteed + 75% chance on 2 random) to redirect attacks. Unkillable (1 turn) allows Dhukk to survive nukes. Reflect Damage (30%, 2 turns) adds chip damage. Use this skill to survive boss nukes or control waves in Doom Tower/FW.

forms.aura: Increase Ally DEF in Faction Crypts by 31%
forms.comments: Dhukk is a top-tier DEF-based debuffer and control champion. His A2 provides AoE Dec ATK + Dec DEF (on crit), making him essential for damage reduction and damage amplification across all content. His A3 Provoke + Unkillable combo allows him to survive big hits while controlling enemies. Build with 100% crit rate, high ACC (250+ for endgame), and DEF/HP for survivability. Excellent in Clan Boss, Dungeons, Doom Tower, and Faction Wars.

stat_priorities: 100% Crit Rate (for consistent Dec DEF on A2)
DEF% and HP% (for survivability, DEF scales damage)

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: 250+ ACC, 200+ SPD, 100% C.RATE, DEF% chestplate, HP% gloves for survivability
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: 220+ ACC, 200+ SPD, 100% C.RATE, DEF%/HP% for survivability, focus on debuff consistency
stat_priority_recommendations.doom_tower: 250+ ACC, 200+ SPD, 100% C.RATE, high RES (200+) for boss floors, DEF%/HP%
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: 200+ SPD, 250+ ACC, 100% C.RATE, high RES for defense teams
stat_priority_recommendations.faction_wars: 200+ ACC, 180+ SPD, 100% C.RATE, DEF%/HP% for survivability in hard stages

recommended_gear: Stalwart + Accuracy (damage reduction for Clan Boss)
Prioritize: 100% C.RATE, 250+ ACC, 200+ SPD, DEF% chestplate, HP% or DEF% gloves

clan_boss: Warmaster (Offense T6 - DEF-based WM procs for extra damage)
Cycle of Magic (Support T5 - cooldown reduction on A2/A3)
Eagle Eye (Support T4 - +30 ACC for debuff consistency)
Lasting Gifts (Support T5 - extends debuffs by 1 turn, critical for Dec ATK/Dec DEF uptime)
Lore of Steel (Defense T2 - +15% set bonuses)
dungeons: Rapid Response (Defense T4 - +18% TM when ally receives critical hit, faster cycling)
doom_tower: Unshakeable (Defense T5 - -30% debuff duration for boss debuffs)

blessings.best: Brimstone (Offense) - damage boost for DEF-based nuker
alternatives: Cruelty (Offense) - increased debuff duration for Dec ATK/Dec DEF

mechanics_advisory.cheese_strategy: None - standard debuffer/control champion, no cheese mechanics
mechanics_advisory.ai_quirks: AI uses A3 Unkillable + Provoke intelligently when low HP or facing AOE threats. A2 prioritized when off cooldown.
mechanics_advisory.general_strategy: PRIMARY DEBUFFER AND CONTROL: Dhukk excels as a debuffer (Dec ATK + Dec DEF + Dec ACC) and controller (Provoke + Unkillable). Build with 100% crit rate to guarantee Dec DEF on all enemies hit by A2. Use A3 to survive boss nukes or control dangerous waves. Excellent in all content due to versatile debuff kit and self-sustain. Pair with damage dealers who benefit from Dec DEF (nukers, HP burn, poisons). HIGH PRIORITY FOR USER: Aligns with Priority 2 (Dungeons), Priority 3 (Doom Tower), and Priority 5 (Faction Wars - Skinwalkers near completion).

validation_metadata.ocr_notes: OCR extracted 2/8 stats directly (C.RATE, ACC). Manual extraction from OCR text for remaining stats: HP 15855, ATK 870 (estimated from typical Epic DEF champions), DEF 1376, SPD 97, C.DMG 50, RES 45. Faction corrected from 'Orcs' (DRAFT error) to 'Skinwalkers' (per Owned_champion_list.md). ATK stat is estimated based on typical Epic DEF champion values.
